ProductInfo.Features:
SmartPhone/Tablet Application - Download the free EZ-SEE application from Apple's App Store and get instant remote video access on your iPhone & iPad devices.
Remote Video Access - Users can remotely access their hidden camera systems from any PC with internet access
Install up to 4 hidden cameras and get simultaneous Quad Video Display and Recording
2 second start up for motion activated recording using PIR (heat motion)
Easy install: just charge it, sit it, and the SC7010 will do the rest
ProductInfo.Name: Xtreme Life Landscape Stone Spy Surveillance Camera w/QUAD LCD Receiver
